ref: 12328 *śarati ʻ is broken, falls ʼ. 2. *śalati2. [Inf. śárītōḥ RV., aor. aśarīt AV., śīryatē ʻ is broken ʼ RV., ʻ falls off ʼ MBh. -- &rcirclemacr 1. Pa. sarati ʻ crushes ʼ, saritaka -- n. ʻ powdered stone ʼ; KharI. &tacute ʻ is broken ʼ; Kt. ċär -- ʻ to break ʼ, tal -- ċeri ʻ shingle ʼ NTS xiii 228; Chil. Gau. šar -- ʻ to break ʼ; K. (incl. vill.) harun ʻ to fall ʼ.
G. saḷvũ ʻ to rot ʼ, saḷɔ m. ʻ rottenness ʼ.
